events.name: Russian air strikes on Ukrainian cities
events.wd_label: Russian air strikes on Ukrainian cities
events.wd_description: At least 25 people were confirmed dead after Russia launched a series of air strikes on cities across Ukraine, including Kyiv.
events.description: At least 25 people were confirmed dead after Russia launched a series of air strikes on cities across Ukraine, including Kyiv.

events.name: Casualties in Uman
events.wd_description: The attack on blocks of flats in Uman killed 23 people, including four children.
events.description: The attack on blocks of flats in Uman killed 23 people, including four children.

events.name: Casualties in Dnipro
events.wd_description: Another woman and her 3-year-old daughter were killed in the city of Dnipro.
events.description: Another woman and her 3-year-old daughter were killed in the city of Dnipro.

events.name: Rescue efforts and aftermath
events.wd_description: Rescuers and residents were seen working at the sites of the explosions, retrieving belongings, and fixing broken windows several hours after the attack.
events.description: Rescuers and residents were seen working at the sites of the explosions, retrieving belongings, and fixing broken windows several hours after the attack.

events.name: Russian defense ministry statement
events.wd_description: The Russian defense ministry claimed the strikes targeted Ukrainian army reserve units.
events.description: The Russian defense ministry claimed the strikes targeted Ukrainian army reserve units.

events.name: Zelensky's response
events.wd_description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky stated that the attack is evidence that further international actions are needed against Russia.
events.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky stated that the attack is evidence that further international actions are needed against Russia.

events.name: Scientists Warn of Rising Global Environmental Threats
events.wd_label: Scientists Warn of Rising Global Environmental Threats
events.wd_description: Scientists from the Earth Commission have provided evidence that the world is facing increasing challenges related to water supply, fertilizer usage, ecosystem management, and aerosol pollution, threatening the stability of life-support systems and exacerbating socioeconomic inequality.
events.description: Scientists from the Earth Commission have provided evidence that the world is facing increasing challenges related to water supply, fertilizer usage, ecosystem management, and aerosol pollution, threatening the stability of life-support systems and exacerbating socioeconomic inequality.

events.name: Rising Environmental Threats
events.wd_description: Scientists have identified growing problems in water supply, fertilizer loading, ecosystem management, and aerosol pollution as major threats to the environment and human well-being.
events.description: Scientists have identified growing problems in water supply, fertilizer loading, ecosystem management, and aerosol pollution as major threats to the environment and human well-being.

events.name: Tipping Points and Stability of Life-Support Systems
events.wd_label: Tipping Points and Stability of Life-Support Systems
events.wd_description: The Earth Commission warns that we are approaching tipping points where the Earth's biophysical systems may no longer remain stable, leading to severe damage to global life-support systems.
events.description: The Earth Commission warns that we are approaching tipping points where the Earth's biophysical systems may no longer remain stable, leading to severe damage to global life-support systems.

events.name: Safe and Just Environmental Criteria
events.wd_description: The study establishes "safe and just" environmental criteria, similar to vital signs for the human body, to monitor key indicators like water flow, phosphorus usage, and land conversion.
events.description: The study establishes "safe and just" environmental criteria, similar to vital signs for the human body, to monitor key indicators like water flow, phosphorus usage, and land conversion.

events.name: Missile strike on medical clinic in Dnipro
events.wd_label: Missile strike on medical clinic in Dnipro
events.wd_description: A missile strike hit a medical clinic in Dnipro, resulting in two deaths and 23 injuries. 21 of the injured are in the hospital, with three in critical condition.
events.description: A missile strike hit a medical clinic in Dnipro, resulting in two deaths and 23 injuries. 21 of the injured are in the hospital, with three in critical condition.

events.name: Details of the strike
events.wd_description: The strike on the medical clinic in Dnipro killed two people and injured 23 others, with firefighters seen trying to control the flames at the scene.
events.description: The strike on the medical clinic in Dnipro killed two people and injured 23 others, with firefighters seen trying to control the flames at the scene.

events.name: Intensified Russian attacks
events.wd_description: Russia has intensified its attacks on Ukraine ahead of an expected counteroffensive from Ukraine.
events.description: Russia has intensified its attacks on Ukraine ahead of an expected counteroffensive from Ukraine.

events.name: Zelensky's response
events.wd_description: Ukrainian President Zelensky posted a video of the damaged clinic, showing firefighters working to control the flames.
events.description: Ukrainian President Zelensky posted a video of the damaged clinic, showing firefighters working to control the flames.

events.name: Ukrainian defense actions
events.wd_description: Ukrainian authorities confirmed they shot down 17 missiles and 31 drones launched by Russia overnight.
events.description: Ukrainian authorities confirmed they shot down 17 missiles and 31 drones launched by Russia overnight.

events.name: BMW's battery assembly plant in South Carolina
events.wd_label: BMW's battery assembly plant in South Carolina
events.wd_description: BMW Group's new battery assembly plant in Woodruff, South Carolina, set to begin production in 2026, will be key to reducing logistics costs and risks in EV production.
events.description: BMW Group's new battery assembly plant in Woodruff, South Carolina, set to begin production in 2026, will be key to reducing logistics costs and risks in EV production.

events.name: Plant groundbreaking
events.wd_description: Executives broke ground this week for the new battery assembly plant in Woodruff, South Carolina.
events.description: Executives broke ground this week for the new battery assembly plant in Woodruff, South Carolina.

events.name: Role in supply chain
events.wd_description: The plant will be an important hub in an integrated, localized supply chain for electric vehicle production for BMW globally.
events.description: The plant will be an important hub in an integrated, localized supply chain for electric vehicle production for BMW globally.
